Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: vary fast moving yellow light swinging and swirling and stopping and turning over large distance very fast
divs: Sighting Details1. sitting on my couch watching tv, facing south, looking west out the glass window, 2. I dont know what made me notice the object 3. I knew it couldn't be a plane or chopper because they fly over very often 4. this light moved very very fast, stopped, did loops over miles very fast, it was a yellow color light 5 this happened a half hour ago i wanted to report it, 6. I lost sight when it went up and north
